item.description:
HALLOWEEN TOGETHER SINGLES DANCE Nashua
Friday  Oct. 26th., 8:00 PM to 1 am.
Crowne Plaza, exit 8 off of rt. 3
Nashua, NH 03061

COSTUMES OPPOSITIONAL No Dress code for this event.

Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm.

Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net  RSVP will be incorrect. This event is posted with up ten different Groups.

Please join Steve Ob1. and about 20 to 50+ friends in your costume or not, for an evening of dancing and socializing. There will be NO prizes, or show of costumes. Just a Dance where we wear, or not our costumes. This is the largest Singles Dances in NH, with between 200 and 300 singles, in a tasteful setting, a ballroom not a Bar. Yet, this is NOT a Ballroom Dance. All you need to do to dance here, is just shake it. This Dance has the widest variety of people, and mix of ages you will find anywhere. Please, get there as close to 8 pm as possible. So you can meet some new people as, Steve Ob1. tries to introduces you to the people at our tables. Because of the popularity of this Dance. Tables and seats, will be hard to hold much past 8:30. Plus, we have the only reserved tables there. Also, if you are late? The Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm.

Ask where Meetup is sitting as you pay at the door. They will show you where we are sitting. Also look for our signs on our tables.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Steve O. or Meetup at the door as you pay, & the Meetup signs on our tables.
item.name: Halloween Together Singles Dance Nashua
